sn55.10:3.3: The commentary attributes the large number of deaths to a recent plague (_ahivātaroga_, “viper’s breath disease”). This deadly contagion was known to kill off entire families ([pli-tv-kd1:50.1.1]()). According to the commentaries, the same disease once afflicted Vesālī, prompting the teaching of the Ratanasutta ([snp2.1](), [kp6]()).
